name: 蔣勇南
objective: 本課程旨在強化學生口語表達及溝通能力，開拓知識領域以及培養學生的國際觀。由逐步短句，段落至長途步口譯，循序漸進。從入門訣竅如讀稿技巧，筆記要領密集訓練及模擬演練。範圍涵蓋經貿，金融，時事，科技，產業等。
schedule:
WK	Date	Topic
1	Sep 14	Introduction  
2	Sep 21	Overview of Interpreting 
3	Sep 28	Glossary Preparation & Public Speaking 
4	Oct 5	Paraphrasing
5	Oct 12	Paraphrasing
6	Oct 19	Short CI
7	Oct 26	Short CI
8	Nov 2	Short CI
9	Nov 9 	Mid-term
10	Nov 16	Memory training
11	Nov 23	Memory training
12	Nov 30	Note-taking 
12	Dec 7	Note-taking
14	Dec 14	Coping tactics
15	Dec 21	Long CI
16	Dec 28	Long CI 
17	Jan 4	Final 
18	Jan 11	Final
scorePolicy:
50% in-class participation, performance and presentation
20% mid-term exam
30% final exam
